page.title: 07NEWSPAPER HEADLINES
page.content: {These are main headlines from Mid {Herts Citizen on May 21st 1985. {Brussels Disaster} 42 people were killed because Liverpool and Juventus fans started rioting at the European Cup Final.All English football teams have been banned from all matches abroad. {Coach Crash 7 children died in coach crash and two adults were also killed.The driver was said to of had a stroke.The crash was in the South of France. {Man stabbed in armed raid A petrol pump attendant was stabbed in the chest during an armed robbery on Friday May 17th. {Bradford fund save People were raising and donating cash for the Bradford fire disaster.The fire started when Bradford City were playing a celebration football match.
